E-Mail Messages
Date: Thursday, 5/1/1978
Subject: Progress of Bruce Bochy
Dear Sir,
Bruce Bochy is hitting the ball well at AA Shreveport Captains!
He has an AVG of .304, so you might want
to promote him soon!

Regards,
Scouting Director



Date: Thursday, 5/1/1978
Subject: Progress of John Tudor
Dear Sir,
John Tudor has an ERA of 1.80 at AA Shreveport Captains!
I believe he is ready for the next level!

Regards,
Scouting Director

Date: Sunday, 5/4/1978
Subject: Playing time
I'd like to complain about my playing time, I think
I am a pretty good player, so why am I no
regular in your lineups?

Regards,
Bobby Etheridge
